languages.text: Память о перенесенных несчастьях и своем погибшем доме наполнила сердца и простолюдинов, и дворян ненавистью к Губительным силам. Пестуя ее в себе, они построили на Новом Райкаде царство нетерпимости и железного порядка. Возглашая молитвы Императору, они сурово следили за следами скверны в своем доме и окружающих колониях, регулярно совершая "походы очищения" на ближайшие колонии, очень схожие с военными вторжениями.

Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.
languages.original_text: Память о перенесенных несчастьях и своем погибшем доме наполнила сердца и простолюдинов, и дворян ненавистью к Губительным силам. Пестуя ее в себе, они построили на Новом Райкаде царство нетерпимости и железного порядка. Возглашая молитвы Императору, они сурово следили за следами скверны в своем доме и окружающих колониях, регулярно совершая "походы очищения" на ближайшие колонии, очень схожие с военными вторжениями.

traits.locale_text: Memories of the adversities they suffered and of their fallen home, filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred towards Ruinous Powers. Fostering it, they build a kingdom of intolerance and iron order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch over any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging expeditions" on closest colonies, that were felt quite similar to military incursions.

Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

languages.text: 无论是对平民还是贵族而言，他们一路遭受了许多苦难，家园沦陷的记忆也令他们痛苦不已，这让他们心中充满了对毁灭之力的憎恨。这样的感情让新莱卡德成为了偏执而严厉的秩序王国。莱卡德人一边向帝皇祈祷，一边时刻警惕家园与周边殖民地的腐化迹象，定期对附近的殖民地展开类似军事入侵的“净化运动”。
languages.original_text: Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

traits.locale_text: 无论是对平民还是贵族而言，他们一路遭受了许多苦难，家园沦陷的记忆也令他们痛苦不已，这让他们心中充满了对毁灭之力的憎恨。这样的感情让新莱卡德成为了偏执而严厉的秩序王国。莱卡德人一边向帝皇祈祷，一边时刻警惕家园与周边殖民地的腐化迹象，定期对附近的殖民地展开类似军事入侵的“净化运动”。

languages.text: Sowohl der Pöbel als auch der Adel wurden geplagt von Erinnerungen an die Mühsal, die sie erlitten hatten, und an ihr gefallenes Zuhause. Der Hass auf die Mächte der Zerstörung einte sie. Dieser Hass führte dazu, dass auf New Rykad ein Königreich der Intoleranz und strikten Ordnung entstand. Die Bewohner beteten den Imperator an und achteten penibel auf jedes kleine Zeichen der Verderbnis in ihrer Heimat und in den umliegenden Kolonien. Regelmäßig zogen sie zu "Säuberungsfeldzügen" gegen benachbarte Kolonien aus, die eher militärischen Invasionen glichen.
languages.original_text: Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

traits.locale_text: Sowohl der Pöbel als auch der Adel wurden geplagt von Erinnerungen an die Mühsal, die sie erlitten hatten, und an ihr gefallenes Zuhause. Der Hass auf die Mächte der Zerstörung einte sie. Dieser Hass führte dazu, dass auf New Rykad ein Königreich der Intoleranz und strikten Ordnung entstand. Die Bewohner beteten den Imperator an und achteten penibel auf jedes kleine Zeichen der Verderbnis in ihrer Heimat und in den umliegenden Kolonien. Regelmäßig zogen sie zu "Säuberungsfeldzügen" gegen benachbarte Kolonien aus, die eher militärischen Invasionen glichen.

languages.text: Les terribles souvenirs des atrocités subies et de tout ce qu'ils avaient perdu marquèrent l'esprit du peuple et de la noblesse, qui vouaient désormais une haine farouche aux Puissances de la Ruine. Cette colère donna naissance à un royaume placé sous le signe de l'ordre et de l'intolérance sur la Nouvelle Rykad. Rendant grâce à l'Empereur-Dieu, ses habitants guettaient le moindre signe de corruption dans leur foyer et organisaient régulièrement des « campagnes de purge » dans les colonies voisines qui n'étaient pas sans rappeler des invasions militaires.
languages.original_text: Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

traits.locale_text: Les terribles souvenirs des atrocités subies et de tout ce qu'ils avaient perdu marquèrent l'esprit du peuple et de la noblesse, qui vouaient désormais une haine farouche aux Puissances de la Ruine. Cette colère donna naissance à un royaume placé sous le signe de l'ordre et de l'intolérance sur la Nouvelle Rykad. Rendant grâce à l'Empereur-Dieu, ses habitants guettaient le moindre signe de corruption dans leur foyer et organisaient régulièrement des « campagnes de purge » dans les colonies voisines qui n'étaient pas sans rappeler des invasions militaires.

languages.text: Los recuerdos de sus adversidades y de su hogar caído están siempre presentes en las mentes de los plebeyos y los nobles por igual, que aprendieron a odiar a los Poderes Ruinosos. Ese desprecio motivó la creación de un reino de orden estricto y tolerancia nula a la herejía en Nueva Rykad. Con oraciones constantes al Emperador, nunca bajaron la guardia frente a todo signo de corrupción en su nuevo mundo ni en las colonias colindantes y realizaron frecuentes «campañas de purga» contra las colonias cercanas, muy similares a invasiones militares.
languages.original_text: Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

traits.locale_text: Los recuerdos de sus adversidades y de su hogar caído están siempre presentes en las mentes de los plebeyos y los nobles por igual, que aprendieron a odiar a los Poderes Ruinosos. Ese desprecio motivó la creación de un reino de orden estricto y tolerancia nula a la herejía en Nueva Rykad. Con oraciones constantes al Emperador, nunca bajaron la guardia frente a todo signo de corrupción en su nuevo mundo ni en las colonias colindantes y realizaron frecuentes «campañas de purga» contra las colonias cercanas, muy similares a invasiones militares.

languages.text: 彼らが被った逆境と崩壊した故郷の記憶は、平民と貴族の心を禍つ神々への憎悪で満たした。その憎悪が、ニュー・ライカドに不寛容と厳格な秩序の王国を築く原動力となった。彼らは皇帝への祈りを宣言し、故郷や周辺コロニーの腐敗の兆候を警戒し、定期的に近隣のコロニーで軍事侵攻のような「粛清作戦」に乗り出した。
languages.original_text: Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

traits.locale_text: 彼らが被った逆境と崩壊した故郷の記憶は、平民と貴族の心を禍つ神々への憎悪で満たした。その憎悪が、ニュー・ライカドに不寛容と厳格な秩序の王国を築く原動力となった。彼らは皇帝への祈りを宣言し、故郷や周辺コロニーの腐敗の兆候を警戒し、定期的に近隣のコロニーで軍事侵攻のような「粛清作戦」に乗り出した。

languages.text: Katlandıkları zorluklara ve kaybettikleri yuvalarına dair hatıralar, sıradan halkın da soyluların da kalbini Yıkıcı Güçler'e karşı nefretle doldurdu. Bu nefret; Yeni Rykad'da toleransın bulunmadığı, katı düzenin işlediği bir krallık kurulmasına önayak oldu. İmparator'a dualarını aksatmadılar, yuvalarındaki ve çevre kolonilerdeki her türlü yozlaşma ibaresine karşı tetikte kaldılar ve yakınlardaki kolonilere sık sık, askerî istilaları andıran "arındırma seferleri" düzenlediler.
languages.original_text: Memories of the adversity they suffered and of their fallen home filled the hearts of both commoners and nobles with hatred for the Ruinous Powers. That loathing fuelled the building of a kingdom of intolerance and strict order on New Rykad. Proclaiming prayers to the Emperor, they kept vigilant watch for any signs of corruption in their home and surrounding colonies and regularly embarked on "purging campaigns" on nearby colonies that resembled military invasions.

traits.locale_text: Katlandıkları güçlüklere ve kaybettikleri yuvalarına dair hatıralar, sıradan halkın da, soyluların da kalbini Yıkıcı Güçlere yönelik bir nefretle doldurdu. Bu nefret, Yeni Rykad'da toleransın bulunmadığı, katı bir düzene sahip bir krallık kurulmasına önayak oldu. İmparator'a dualarını aksatmadılar, yuvalarındaki ve çevre kolonilerdeki her türlü yozlaşma ibaresine karşı tetikte kaldılar ve yakınlardaki kolonilere düzenli olarak, askerî istilaları andıran "arındırma seferleri" düzenlediler.
